C

Calculator - Interface in exchangeRate
 
CalculatorImpl - Class in exchangeRate
Calculator converts in between two provided currencies as specified in the provided exchange rate.
convert(Currencies, Currencies, double) - Method in interface exchangeRate.Calculator
Converts a provided amount in currency "from" to an amount in currency "to"
convert(Currencies, Currencies, double) - Method in class exchangeRate.CalculatorImpl
 
create(Currencies, Currencies, double) - Static method in class exchangeRate.CalculatorImpl
Creates a currency calculator which converts in between currencies "first" and "second" at the specified rate.
Currencies - Enum in exchangeRate
Currencies enumerates the currencies that are supported by the exchangeRate Calculator.
